flavor: “I'm going to stand side by side with you to protect our right to live in this world.”
name: Angelica Jones
text: Schooling for the Gifted — Action: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck. (Limit once per round.)

name: Firestar
text: [star] Supercharge — Interrupt: When you use a basic power, discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck → if at least 1 [energy] or [wild] resource was discarded this way, you get +1 to that basic power for this use. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Justice
text: [star] Response: After Justice uses a basic power, put an identity-specific card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Microwave Blast
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck. For each [energy] or [wild] resource discarded as a part of this effect, this attack deals 1 additional damage. If 3 or more [energy] or [wild] icons were discarded, deal 1 damage to each minion engaged with you.

name: Radiative Vision
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. Discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck. For each [energy] or [wild] resource discarded this way, remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Ambient Microwaves
text: Interrupt: When you spend this card, shuffle it into your deck instead of discarding it. Hero Response: After this card is discarded from the top of your deck, ready Firestar.

name: Clandestine Operative
text: Max 1 per player. Firestar gets +1 THW. Forced Response: After Firestar attacks, discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck. For each [energy] or [wild] resource discarded this way, deal 1 damage to an enemy or remove 1 threat from a scheme. Discard Clandestine Operative.

name: Once an Avenger...
text: Firestar gains the [[AVENGER]] trait. Hero Interrupt: After you defeat an enemy or a scheme, exhaust Once an Avenger... → put a resource card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Plasma Propulsion
text: Firestar gets +1 DEF and gains retaliate 1 and the [[AERIAL]] trait. Hero Interrupt: When you would discard cards from the top of your deck, exhaust Plasma Propulsion → you may discard up to 2 additional cards from the top of your deck.

name: Solar Surge
text: Hero Interrupt: When you use Firestar's "Supercharge" ability, if you discard at least 1 [energy] and/or [wild] resource, you get an additional +1 to the chosen basic power for this use.

name: Stellar Aura
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Stellar Aura → generate the resources of the top resource card in your discard pile. Then, put that resource card on the bottom of your deck.
